description: Non-material amendment of planning permission P2012/0637/FUL dated 7th May 2014.  The amendment involves: a reduction in the extent of the basement; removal of the single storey addition; repositioning of the roof plant; reduction in height of ground floor level; increase in height of 6th floor and plant; relocation of cycle parking; changes to south elevation and minor changes to ground floor north elevation.
decision_conditions:
Condition 2 of planning permission ref: P2012/0637/FUL should read:

"CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

Proposed drawings: 3398-D-001 C1 Site Location Plan; 2857_D002 Rev P3 proposed block site plan; 3398_L-110 Revision C2 Proposed Basement Plan; 3398_L-111 Revision C3 Proposed Ground Floor Plan; 3398_L-112 Revision C2 Proposed First Floor Plan; 3398_L-113 Rev C2 Proposed Second Floor Plan; 3398_L-114 Rev C2 Proposed Third Floor Plan; 3398_L-115 Rev C2 Proposed Fourth Floor Plan; 3398_L-116 Rev C2 Proposed Fifth Floor Plan; 3398_L-117 Rev C2 Proposed Sixth Floor Plan; 3398_L-118 Rev C2 Proposed Lower Roof Plan; 3398_L-119 Rev C2 Proposed UpperRoof Plan; 3398_L-303 rev C3 Proposed cross section; 3398_L-320 Rev C7 Proposed North Elevation; 3398_L-321 Rev C6 Proposed East Elevation; 3398_L-322 Rev C7 Proposed South Elevation; 3398_L-323 Rev C6 Proposed West Elevation; 2857_D500 Rev P4 bedroom plans; 2857_D501 Rev P3 accessible bedroom plans; 2857_D502 Rev P3 flat plans; 2857_D503 Rev P4 kitchen plans; 2857_D504 Rev P4 kitchen plans; 

Existing Drawings 2857_SY001 rev P2; 2857_SY002 rev P2; 2857_SY003 rev P2; 2857_SY110 rev P2; 2857_SY111 rev P2; 2857_SY112 rev P2; 2857_SY113 rev P2; 2857_SY114 rev P2; 2857_SY115 rev P2; 2857_SY116 rev P2; 2857_SY117 rev P2; 2857_S300 rev P2; 2857_SY301 rev P1; 2857_SY320 rev P2; 2857_SY321 rev P2; 2857_SY322 rev P2; 2857_SY323 rev P2.       

Planning Statement dated December 2012; Design and Access Statement Revision A dated March 2013; Daylight and Shadow Assessment Issue 4 dated November 2012; Sustainability Statement dated 20th December 2012; Sustainable Energy Report A dated 20th December 2012; Transport Statement by JMP dated December 2012; Travel Plan by JMP dated December 2012; YMCA Errol Street Site Report - Envirocheck - December 2012; Archaeological Desk Based Assessment dated December 2012; Acoustic Survey Issue 1 dated December 2012; Levitt Bernstein Non-material amendment summary dated 19 July 2017;  Levitt Bernstein Internal levels summary dated 18 August 2017 including appendices (London Plan extract and plans 4656-PBS-010 rev 3; -006 rev 3.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning."

application_details.lead_developer_company_name: Thames Water Utilities, Development Control Department
